i cry while u sleep

but also while you're awake
Character Bios
Home


A lot of my comics are sort of commentary on modern social phenomena that I experience or embody, and so I use myself as the stand in and generic non-persons to interact with. But I sometimes surreptitiously slip in actual people with names. Here are the ones that have showed up multiple times so far.

Ssssshhh don't let them know I'm drawing them.


Bria
Just like my character in the comic, I am a caricature of myself.
Rob
Rob lives in my house and occasionally gives me really good advice.
Mike
Mike shows up once in a while to remind me why he doesn't love me.
Gosia
Gosia plays the vital role in my life of mutual complainer.
Ken
Ken is pretty self-explanatory.
Kelly
Kelly serves as my EDM consultant and general ghost wrangler.
Mark
Mark is a mathematician, can't you tell?
Marianne
Sometimes she kinda gets me, ya know?
Mom
I'm probably at least partially her fault.
Tony
Tony only exists inside my phone.
Assorted Coworkers
I normally don't reveal their names, but they're still there.
Dudes I totally have a Patreon
(The money goes to charity.)
